type.description: This app will be generated as a Remote app.

title.description: App title. Multiple words must be wrapped in quotes.

host.description: Specify the Host app to connect to (shell-spa is our default Host)

remotePortNumber.description: Specify a unique port number that is not already being used.

includeBff.description: If selected, generator will scaffold a NestJS BFF

includeIaC.description: If selected, generator will scaffold infrastructure as Code for this application

includeMockServer.description: If this is on it will include mock server configuration for bff

style.description: The file extension to be used for style files.

x-prompt.message: Which stylesheet format would you like to use?

notificationsEmail.description: Alerts notification email for observability. This is required if you include Iac option.

cmsEnabled.description: If selected, generator will deploy generic content to the CMS in CI and DV. This content is used to integrate the MFE with the Shell Spa.

wikiEnabled.description: If selected, generator will create LRR wiki documentation for the MFE.

businessService.description: The ServiceNow business service name for your app. This will be used in your LRR documentation.

assignmentGroup.description: The ServiceNow assignment group name for your app. This will be used in your LRR documentation.
